title: fragment: CHH-8
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-source= --]]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|bg-color=rgb(255, 174, 163)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-bg-color=rgb(245, 130, 115)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-colors= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|bg-color=rgb(135, 107, 100)
|txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
|border-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-bg-color=rgb(74, 61, 58)
|label-txt-color=rgb(255, 255, 255)
]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
We should meet up again soon.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-7/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
I agree. Just... in a little bit.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You need to put your tracker on him, since you're not going with him. You can't let him get away.

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Can we hug before we part ways?
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

Epon gives you an awkward smile.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-3/E.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Sure.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

Epon leans in for a hug, giving you easy access to his coat pocket. You slip the tracker in.

Epon pulls away after a few moments.

[[=image http://hexhouse.wdfiles.com/local--files/fragment%3Achh-7/C.png width="450px"]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-1
|unique-name=name-1
|display-name=Epon
]]
Well, let's meet again, some day. I'll let you know when I'm available.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-start= --]
|color-family=colors-2
|unique-name=name-2
|display-name=You
]]
Sure thing.
[[include :scp-wiki:component:blacklight-box-source |inc-section-end= --]]]

You watch as he gains more and more distance from you. You alert the agents in Site-450 to get ready for an ambush.

Sure, you accomplished your mission. But you feel dissatisfied.

**##gold| Maybe things could've gone differently.##**

**##gold| NEUTRAL END##**
author: Mew-ltiverse
